# append(_:)

**Instance Method**

Provides metadata to the capture session.

## Declaration

```swift
func append(_ metadata: AVTimedMetadataGroup) throws
```

## Parameters

- **metadata**: A timed group of metadata. To denote a period of no metadata, pass an empty [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVTimedMetadataGroup].
title: append(_:)
